S

send_questions(Question) - Method in class quiz.Game
Loads and sends the questions to all clients connected
sendClientID() - Method in class server.Client
Initiates a send command to send the client id generated by this server to the client connected to this listener.
Sender - Class in server
Sender sends data to its assigned client
Sender(Socket, Packet) - Constructor for class server.Sender
Creates a new sender to communicate with a client
sendPacket(Packet) - Method in class server.Client
Starts a new sender thread which sends data to this threads client
sendResults(String[]) - Method in class quiz.Game
Sends the compiled results to all connected clients
server - package server
 
Server - Class in server
Server listens to the network for incoming connections from clients wanting to join the quiz.
Server(Game, int, int) - Constructor for class server.Server
Creates a new server to listen for connecting clients
server() - Method in class server.Server
Main server thread, this method handles the connection of new clients connecting to the server.
set_game_start(boolean) - Method in class quiz.Game
Sets gameStart to start the quiz
set_Number_of_Clients(int) - Method in class quiz.Game
Sets the number of clients able to connect and participate in this quiz session.
set_Number_of_Questions(int) - Method in class quiz.Game
Sets the number of questions that need to be loaded and used within this quiz session.
set_Port_Number(int) - Method in class quiz.Game
Sets the port number for the server to listen to, each client will have to be configured to listen to this specified port numbrt
splitBytes(byte[]) - Method in class packet.Packet
Splits a byte array into separate byte arrays.
